from tenants_apps
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update tenants_apps
TENANT_ID = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEBSITE_NAME = #{record.websiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{record.contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_PHONE = #{record.registerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from tenants_apps where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_usable='1'
select WEBSITE_NAME from tenants_apps where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}
select tenant_id as 'tenantId', domain, website_name as 'websiteName', TENANTS_PHONE as 'tenantsPhone' from tenants_apps where TENANT_ID = #{id}
